posts.name: Jamie Kyle
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.78.0-beta.1. If you‚Äôre interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • This update improves accessibility for screen reader users by skipping repeated timestamp announcements when new messages arrive in a thread.
  • We also fixed a bug that could prevent notifications from appearing on Windows.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.77.0-beta.1‚Ä¶v7.78.0-beta.1 ¬∑ signalapp/Signal-Desktop ¬∑ GitHub

New Version: 7.78.0-beta.1

62 new commits since 7.77.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.78.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Improve profile key validation [2]

  • Disable chat folder filtering when feature is disabled [3]

  • Prepare for adding file suffixes [4]

  • Rename files [5]

  • Suffix lint rule and fixes [6]

  • Migrate all preferences buttons to axo button [7]

  • Update action reproducible build scheduler to not clone repo [8]

  • Add shortcuts for add/remove chat to chat folder [9]

  • Remember scroll position in chats [10]

  • Improve timeline layout rendering [11]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.59.2 [12]

  • Adjust timeline message scroll targeting to use scrollIntoView [13]

  • Add ability to send poll create messages [14]

  • Add ability to send poll votes [15]

  • Notification Profiles: Normalize ids [16]

  • Update symbols font [17]

  • Improve marking messages read after wheel event when unfocused [18]

  • Adjust conversation search rankings for archived conversations [19]

  • Support muting from AirPods on macOS [20]

  • Help debugging muteStateChange issues [21]

  • Fix lost drafts when restoring chat scroll position [22]

  • Improve screenreader experience with timestamps in chat list [23]

  • Increase concurrency of profile & key fetches [24]

  • Ensure all deps are categorized in file-suffix [25]

  • Fix lint for mute-state-change package [26]

  • Release notes for 7.77 [27]

  • Update strings [28]

  • Update DNS fallback [29]

  • Remove invalid quotes from conversation [30]

  • Ensure last message text is always updated [31]

  • Fix initial all chats folder params [32]

  • Simplify edit handling of attachments [33]

  • Fix reference to build-localized-display-names script [34]

  • Find by username: Don't automatically add .01 discriminator [35]

  • Upgrade electron to 38.4.0, electron-builder to 26.1.0 [36]

  • Revert "Support muting from AirPods on macOS" [37]

  • Import WindowsNotifications unconditionally [38]

  • Fix badge counts for include muted setting [39]

  • Use v2 endpoints for groups WebAPI [40]

  • Add message preview for polls [41]

  • Fix app icon for Linux adhoc builds [42]

  • Avoid incorrect use of preload cache [43]

  • Exclude our own conversation from connection count [44]

  • Revert electron-builder to 26.0.14 [45]

  • Allow .tsx files to be .std.tsx [46]

  • Fix uncaught error in AttachmentCrypto [47]

  • Use emoji sheet with fallback [48]

  • Show draftTimestamp in left pane preview [49]

  • Notification Profiles: Exclude silenced conversations from badge count [50]

  • Fix chat folder settings title when editing folder [51]

  • Fix backup group update test cases [52]

  • Update emoji-picker-react in sticker creator [53]

  • Temporarily downgrade libsignal from 0.85.1 to 0.83.0 [54]

  • Chat folder fixes [55]

  • Fix typing indicators for 1:1 conversations [56]

  • Run test-release in a temporary folder [57]

  • Show contact modal on click when reviewing [58]

  • Update release notes [59]

  • Fix lint [60]

  • Update strings [61]

  • 7.78.0-beta.1 [62]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.77.0-beta.1‚Ä¶v7.78.0-beta.1

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn‚Äôt).

At least 67 languages changed since 7.77.0-beta.1:

For technical reasons, not all languages may be listed below. However, everything from ‚ÄúUpdated language translations‚Äù and similar commits is listed, so the list is likely complete. You can view the full comparison to 7.77.0-beta.1 so far here.

Show changes
  • Afrikaans (af-ZA)
  • Albanian (sq-AL)

  • Latvian (lv-LV)
  • Lithuanian (lt-LT)
  • Macedonian (mk-MK)
  • Malay (macrolanguage) (ms)
  • Malayalam (ml-IN)
  • Marathi (mr-IN)
  • Modern Greek (1453-) (el)
  • Norwegian Bokm√•l (nb)

Localization changes for the release are the same, as this is the first build of the release.
